## Queue3.getFailed() method

Returns a promise that will return an array with the failed jobs between start and end.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
getFailed(start?: number, end?: number): Promise<Array<Job>>;
```

|  --- | --- | --- |

|  end | number |  |
